prompts: Create a unique dragon-type Pokemon with fiery armor and a spiky shell.
I want a turtle-like Pokemon that has vibrant yellow and red colors.
Generate a Pokemon with a tough exterior, resembling a volcano with flames.
Make a creature that combines dragon and turtle features, showcasing bold colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that can withstand heat, with a striking design and fiery elements.
Design a Pokemon with a shell that looks like a sunburst, full of color.
Give me a powerful fire/dragon Pokemon with a robust build and sharp spikes.

distinctive_features: Unique head shape with prominent features

semantic_attributes.combat_style: Defensive and offensive with fire-based attacks
